ygData.subject: Grumpy Gnomes
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, what s the deal with the pissed off Gnomes in Steamfront?!? Yesterday I had my wood elf Ranger over there just hacking and slashing Kobolds and I decide to
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, what's the deal with the pissed off Gnomes in Steamfront?!?
Yesterday I had my wood elf Ranger over there just hacking and slashing
Kobolds and I decide to try a Minotaur just for fun. On my way there I
pass a group of Gnomes by the wall just after the telescopes. All I do
is start to pass them, not say a word or anything and the little buggers
& they took off after me! I wasn't sure if I could take them since there
were about a dozen of them and I'm only lvl 9 but I may go back and if I
can get at least one at a time I'll be happy!
So does anyone know if they are PKs (Player-Killers) or an actual part
of the game? I heard they were for some quest but it hasn't been
confirmed.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Steven R. Hulse Denver, CO. USA
steve@... www.kosingigglephits.com
AIM: kosingigglephts ICQ:648971 Y:kosingigglephitz

Shizney: 7th level Gnome Magician
